original_text: Then too, I saw the wicked buried—those who used to come and go from the holy place and receive praise in the city where they did this. This too is meaningless.
korean_text: 그런 후에 내가 본즉 악인들은 장사지낸 바 되어 거룩한 곳을 떠나 그들이 그렇게 행한 성읍 안에서 잊어버린 바 되었으니 이것도 헛되도다

sentences.original_text: Then too, I saw the wicked buried
sentences.korean_translation: 나도 또한 악인들이 장사되는 것을 보았는데

sentences.original_text: those who used to come and go
and receive praise in the city
